Directions
Season patties generously with salt and pepper. Cook, flipping often, to desired doneness on a hot grill or in a lightly oiled cast iron skillet on the stovetop, 125°F (52°C) for medium rare or 135°F (57°C) for medium. Transfer to a plate and allow to rest for 5 minutes.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Set patties on bun bottoms, layering with toppings and condiments of choice, then close burgers and serve.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
